name: Easy Caramel Apple Dip
author: JenniferCooks
summary: Caramel apple dip--fresh Granny Smith apples alongside sweetened cream cheese, topped with caramel topping and Heath® toffee bits.
ingredients: 1 (12 ounce) jar salted caramel sauce (such as Smucker's® Simple Delight™))
1 cup toffee baking bits (such as Heath Bits 'O Brickle®)
4 large Granny Smith apples - peeled, cored, and thickly sliced
directions: Beat cream cheese and powdered sugar in a medium bowl with an electric mixer until fluffy
Spread mixture evenly onto a platter
Spread salted caramel sauce on top and sprinkle generously with toffee bits
